body_html:
Note this is roughly what Numpy does with integer tuples: https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/8323be1bc44c2811fc36f5b99c1a30ebcee8edbd/numpy/core/src/multiarray/conversion_utils.c#L792-L882

The difference is they use PyLong_CheckExact / PyInt_CheckExact instead of PyLong / PyInt. We could probably do that to because I'm guessing the PyNumber_Index call will work for non-exact PyLongs / PyInts.
body_text:
Note this is roughly what Numpy does with integer tuples: https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/8323be1bc44c2811fc36f5b99c1a30ebcee8edbd/numpy/core/src/multiarray/conversion_utils.c#L792-L882
The difference is they use PyLong_CheckExact / PyInt_CheckExact instead of PyLong / PyInt.  We could probably do that to because I'm guessing the PyNumber_Index call will work for non-exact PyLongs / PyInts.
body:
Note this is roughly what Numpy does with integer tuples: https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/8323be1bc44c2811fc36f5b99c1a30ebcee8edbd/numpy/core/src/multiarray/conversion_utils.c#L792-L882

The difference is they use PyLong_CheckExact / PyInt_CheckExact instead of PyLong / PyInt.  We could probably do that to because I'm guessing the PyNumber_Index call will work for non-exact PyLongs / PyInts.
